more.about:
"Pizza 4P's" is an Italian Japanese pizza restaurant located in the center of Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. With homemade cheese freshly produced in our Dalat farm and a hand-bult wood-fired oven, we serve original and unique cuisine - pizza, pasta, and more! Since established in 2010, thankfully, we have been highly recognized by various magazines, TV shows and online media.
If you are looking for a restaurant with quality food and service in Ho Chi Minh City, Pizza 4P's is the place to be.
Please click the links below for reviews from our guests.
Tripadvisor: http://www.tripadvisor.com/Restaurant_Review-g293925-d2200413-Reviews-Pizza_4P_s-Ho_Chi_Minh_City.html
Foody.vn: http://www.foody.vn/ho-chi-minh/pizza-4p-s
